mapper.delete: delete from course_classes_sign ccs where ccs.classes_id in (select cc.id from course_classes cc where cc.course_id = #{0})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id, u.name AS name,u.photo AS photo,u.phone AS phone FROM user u JOIN course_classes_sign ccs ON u.id = ccs.user_id WHERE ccs.classes_id = #{0} GROUP BY ccs.create_time DESC

select c.*,i.name as institution_name from institution i join course c on i.id = c.institution_id join course_classes cc on c.id = cc.course_id join course_classes_sign ccs on cc.id = ccs.classes_id where ccs.user_id = #{0}

SELECT u.id AS id,u.name AS NAME,u.photo AS photo,u.phone AS phone FROM user u JOIN institution_user iu ON u.id = iu.user_id WHERE (u.name = #{0} OR u.phone = #{0}) AND u.id NOT IN (SELECT ccs.user_id FROM course_classes_sign ccs WHERE ccs.classes_id = #{1}) AND iu.institution_id IN (SELECT cc2.institution_id FROM course_classes cc2 WHERE cc2.id = #{1})

select u.id as id,u.name as name,u.photo as photo,u.phone as phone from user u where (u.name = #{0} or u.phone = #{0}) and u.id in (select ccs.user_id from course_classes_sign ccs where ccs.classes_id = #{1})

SELECT c.id AS course_id,c.name AS course_name,c.cover AS cover,cc.id AS class_id,cc.name AS class_name,u.id AS user_id,u.name AS user_name,u.phone AS phone FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN course_classes cc ON ccs.classes_id = cc.id JOIN course c ON cc.course_id = c.id JOIN user u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE (SELECT DAYOFYEAR(MAX(ccp.date)) FROM course_classes_plan ccp WHERE ccp.course_classes_id = cc.id) >= DAYOFYEAR(NOW()) AND ccs.user_id = #{0} AND cc.institution_id = #{1}
SELECT ccs.classes_id FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN course_classes cc ON ccs.classes_id = cc.id WHERE ccs.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ccs.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_classes_sign ccs WHERE ccs.classes_id = #{0}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_classes_order WHERE user_id = #{0} AND class_id = #{1}

SELECT cc.id AS id,cc.cover AS cover,cc.name AS name, cc.start_date AS start_date,cc.end_date AS end_date, cc.start_time AS start_time,cc.end_time AS end_time, cc.user_id AS user_id,u.name AS user_name,cc.plan_count AS plan_count, cc.student_count AS student_count,cc.price AS price,i.name AS institution_name, cc.address AS address,(SELECT ccps.id FROM course_classes_plan_sign ccps WHERE ccps.class_id = cc.id AND ccps.user_id = #{0} AND DATE(ccps.create_time) = DATE(#{1}) ) AS sign_id, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_classes_plan_sign ccps WHERE ccps.class_id = cc.id) AS total_sign_count, cc.plan_count AS total_count FROM course_classes cc JOIN course_classes_sign ccs ON cc.id = ccs.classes_id JOIN `user` u ON cc.user_id = u.id JOIN institution i ON cc.institution_id = i.id WHERE ccs.user_id = #{0} AND cc.start_date <= DATE(#{1}) AND cc.end_date >= DATE(#{1}) ORDER BY cc.start_time
SELECT u.id AS id,u.name AS `name`,u.phone AS phone,u.photo AS photo,u.sex AS sex FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN `user` u ON ccs.user_id = u.id WHERE ccs.classes_id = #{0}

SELECT u.id AS id,u.name AS `name`,u.phone AS phone,u.photo AS photo,u.sex AS sex FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN `user` u ON ccs.user_id = u.id WHERE ccs.classes_id = #{classId}
AND (u.name LIKE '%${key}%' OR u.phone = #{key})

SELECT u.id AS id,u.photo AS photo,u.name AS `name`,u.phone AS phone FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN course_classes cc ON ccs.classes_id = cc.id JOIN `user` u ON ccs.user_id = u.id WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId}
AND (u.phone = #{key} OR u.name LIKE '%${key}%')

SELECT cco.id AS id,cco.code AS `code`,cco.class_id AS class_id,cc.name AS class_name, cco.user_id AS user_id,cco.user_name AS user_name,u.photo AS user_photo,u.phone AS user_phone, cco.institution_id AS institution_id,cco.institution_name AS institution_name, cco.user_count AS user_count,cco.price AS price,cco.create_time AS create_time FROM course_classes_order cco JOIN course_classes cc ON cco.class_id = cc.id JOIN `user` u ON cco.user_id = u.id WHERE cco.institution_id = #{0} AND DATE(cco.create_time) = DATE(#{1})
